extracted_information: The web content provides a list of 40 TikTok viral Amazon products, focusing on convenience and utility. The list includes various home organization and lifestyle items with detailed descriptions and specifications where available.

features.name: The Lazy Susan Turntable Organizer
features.description: A classic rotating organizer for easy access to products on shelves, countertops, or dressing tables. Features 360-degree rotational plates and comes in packs of two or four for efficient storage.

features.name: The Lazy Susan Revolution Turn Table Expandable
features.description: An expandable version of the Lazy Susan, ideal for effortlessly passing food on a table. It has a non-slide surface and is heat resistant.

features.name: Waterproof heated snow boots
features.description: Insulated boots for warmth in cold temperatures (down to -25F). Available in sizes 8, 9, and 10, they feature rechargeable 3200mAh batteries and arctic fleece inner lining.

features.name: Portable steam sauna
features.description: A personal sauna setup that heats in 5 minutes, reaching 130°F-140°F with 15 heating levels and 360° even steam distribution. The tent measures 32″ x 32″ x 71″ and includes a waterproof folding chair and foot mat.

features.name: Rain cloud nightlight
features.description: An aesthetic nightlight that also functions as a humidifier and diffuser. It offers seven adjustable LED light settings for a soft glow and requires water tank refills every 8-10 days.

features.name: Digital notebook
features.description: A reusable and eco-friendly notebook that connects to your phone. Handwritten notes can be scanned and uploaded to services like Google Drive, Dropbox, and OneNote via the Rocketbook app for digital organization.

features.name: Retractable tether cable
features.description: Designed to prevent loss of remote or gaming controllers by keeping them attached to a base. Features telescopic steel cable and CM adhesive patch, compatible with curved surfaces.

features.name: 3 in 1 Wireless Charging Station for Apple
features.description: A magnetic wireless charging station that simultaneously charges iPhone (16/15/14/13/12 series), iWatch (10/9/8/7/6/5/4/3/2/SE/Ultra/Ultra 2), and AirPods (2/3/4/Pro/Pro 2).

features.name: Lockabox One Premium Lock Box
features.description: A lockable box made of unbreakable BPA-safe polycarbonate material, capable of enduring temperatures down to -80 degrees Celsius. Available in Lockabox One and Lockabox Mini sizes.

features.name: Furbo 360° Dog Camera
features.description: A pet monitoring camera offering real-time updates via an app, with a 360° view. Features include color night vision, treat tossing (for separation anxiety), and smart alerts.

features.name: Collapsible water bottles
features.description: A 610ml portable, foldable, and leakproof water bottle made of 100% BPA-free food-grade silicone. Suitable for both hot and cold temperatures and is dishwasher safe.

features.name: Desktop water dispenser pump
features.description: A convenient tabletop water dispenser that encourages water intake and acts as a lamp. Features adjustable height for various cups, a built-in 2000 mAh battery, and a USB charging cord.

features.name: AIRTHEREAL RH180 Desktop Range Hood
features.description: A portable range hood with an enhanced 3-layer filtration system (PVC/Aluminum/Carbon) and an expanded oil collection box. Offers two fan speed settings (low/medium) with 24 watts/hr power consumption and minimal noise.

features.name: 2-in-1 Hot & Cold Vacuum Insulated 30oz Tumblers
features.description: Tumblers from Splitflask Store designed to carry two different drinks (hot and cold) in one cup. Made of 100% leak-proof and BPA-free materials, available in 6 colors, with a twist-apart design for easy cleaning.

features.name: Star Projector Galaxy Night Light – Astronaut Space Projector
features.description: A projector that transforms any space into a planetarium-like environment with 8 different colored effects and green LED projection stars. Settings, brightness, and rotation can be adjusted with a remote controller.

features.name: WOOLALA UV Sun Umbrella with Fan, Portable Cooling Fan Umbrella UPF 50+
features.description: An umbrella with UPF 50+ protection and a built-in 2600mAh rechargeable fan in the handle. Features a compact design with vinyl coating and fiberglass ribs, plus dual fan settings.

features.name: Double-Row Deform Wheel Automatic Walking Shoes
features.description: Running shoes that transform into gliding shoes with wheels activated from the heels. Available in 15 variants, including options with lights.

features.name: Snore Stopper with Adjustable Magnet
features.description: A simple clip that unblocks nasal passages when placed between nostrils, providing an unblocked air supply to reduce snoring.

features.name: Pothunder Smart Fingerprint Padlock
features.description: A padlock available in 5 colors that unlocks with a fingerprint (0.5 seconds) or remotely via Bluetooth connection and a mobile application.

features.name: Levitating moon lamp
features.description: A bedside lamp that floats, offering a calming ambiance. It has a natural golden white color with 15 additional color settings, 20 modes in total, and a touch-sensitive on/off button.

features.name: Mopping slippers
features.description: Slippers made of chenille fibre or microfiber for easy cleaning of floors. Available in 5 colors, they have stretchable material for a good hold and can be hand or machine-washed.

features.name: Handy Laundry – Folding Step Stool
features.description: A utilitarian folding step stool capable of holding 300 lbs, suitable for kitchen, bathroom, or outdoor use. It's portable and features a good grip to prevent slips.

features.name: Vabroom Cordless 2-in-1 Sweeper with Built-In Vacuum
features.description: A cleaning tool with a 20,000 RPM Motor and lithium battery (USB charged). It operates in a sweep, suck, and eject cycle, offering powerful suction with minimal noise.

features.name: Contour Memory Foam Pillow
features.description: An orthopedic pillow designed for side sleepers, shaping itself automatically and rebounding within seconds. Features an attached pillowcase, removable mesh sides, excellent moisture absorption, and breathability.

features.name: Cutting board scissors
features.description: Smart kitchen scissors combining the functionality of a vegetable cutter and chopping board, making chopping fast and convenient for meat and veggies. Dishwasher-friendly and includes a safety lock.

features.name: Inkless printer
features.description: The POLONO Portable Printer Wireless, weighing 1.17 pounds, is eco-friendly as it doesn't require ink cartridges. It operates for about 49 minutes, printing 200 sheets, and connects via Bluetooth to iOS, Android, and PC devices.

features.name: Laundry turtle
features.description: A collapsible laundry basket designed for convenient collection, folding, and seamless transfer of clothes from washer to dryer, preventing lost items.

features.name: Ice roller
features.description: A handy tool for facial icing that promotes blood circulation, controls under-eye puffiness and wrinkles, and helps lift the face.

features.name: K18 Leave-In Molecular Hair Mask
features.description: A leave-in treatment mask that repairs damaged hair strands at a molecular level in just 4 minutes. Ideal for heat or color-damaged hair, providing immediate results.

features.name: Cosrx snail mucin
features.description: The COSRX Snail Mucin 96% Power Repairing Essence, a popular Korean product that improves dullness and repairs/replenishes skin from dryness to achieve 'glass skin'.

features.name: Revlon Oil-Absorbing Roller
features.description: A portable mattifier that instantly absorbs oil from the T-zone for a zero-oiliness look without smudging makeup. Designed for rolling directly on the skin surface.

features.name: Length Stainless Steel Finish Magnetic Shelf for Kitchen Stove
features.description: A durable magnetic shelf that quickly attaches to the stove, maximizing kitchen storage space for items like spice pots. Features silicon-coated magnets to prevent scratches and requires no installation.

features.name: White Cloud Magnetic Wall Key Holder
features.description: A cute and convenient magnetic wall key holder shaped like a cloud, offering a fun way to store keys.

features.name: Satin Heatless Curling Set
features.description: An overnight curler that creates curls without heat damage, suitable for all hair types including kids'. The satin coating prevents frizz, and it comes with two scrunchies to secure it.

features.name: Clinique Black Honey Lipstick
features.description: A sheer wine shade lipstick that gained viral popularity among beauty enthusiasts for its quality and trending sheer finish.

features.name: Netany Drinking Glasses with Glass Straws
features.description: Aesthetic and eco-friendly drinking glasses paired with glass straws. Offers a luxurious feel for beverages and supports environmental consciousness.

features.name: L’Oréal Paris Telescopic Lift Washable Mascara
features.description: A mascara designed to provide both lift and volume to lashes, available for under $10.

features.name: ChomChom Roller Reusable Pet Hair Remover
features.description: A best-selling reusable pet hair remover that doesn't require adhesive paper. Efficiently removes pet hair from surfaces.

features.name: Candle Warmer Lamp
features.description: Allows for a fragrant home space by warming candles without lighting them, eliminating the risk of open flames.

features.name: Rechargeable Electric Lighter
features.description: A chic lighter using plasma flameless arc technology, making it windproof and a safer alternative to matchsticks for lighting candles.

temporal_info.article_publication_date: March 2025 (implied by image paths and article title '40 Game-changing TikTok Amazon Finds of 2025')
temporal_info.K18 Leave-In Molecular Hair Mask: Best, most talked about hair product in 2024
temporal_info.Clinique Black Honey Lipstick: Won over every beauty enthusiast last year
